page.title: 04Buildings in Steeple Claydon
page.content: Altogether there are{633 buildings within the village of Steeple Claydon,of these{611 are dwellings.}In a recent survey performed by school children there were found to be 15 very old dwellings dating back to the {17th and 18th century.}All of these {are }thatched,half-timbered houses. During the{19th century}when space was more readily available 76 dwellings were built,90% of these being detached or semi-detached.At this time 2 shops and 2 public houses were built as well as community facilities such as the village hall,school and library.{Between 1900 {and 1945}a similar number of dwellings were built,however only 10% of these were detached,70% were semi-detached,the remaining 20% being terraced.3 more shops were built along with 2 public houses.
